name: Dream's Shield
description:
Embrace adventure in this unique point of view of the classic tale of the Sleeping Beauty where Aurora, a girl who is in a deep coma for unknown reasons, has to find a way to wake up from the deeps of her nightmares.

She won't be alone though. Hipnos, the god of dreams has sent his little helper Morfeo. The two of them will have to use their best abilities to survive the nightmares and the most deep darkness that threatens Aurora, to do it, they will have to collect the fairy godmothers of every level in order to gather the necessary power and finally wake up.

CONTROLS:

  • W,A,S,D: to move
  • Spacebar: Jump/Double Jump (Aurora)
  • E: Morfeo Skill
  • F: Interact
  • Shift: Character change
  • R: Pause menu

Made by: NightmareStudio

 

Juia Garcia

Marc Casamajó 

 

Olga Lopez
